title: Growth Marketing Designer
description:
Paid Social Designer



About the Company



We're a leading nursery furniture company behind some of the most trusted and recognizable brands in the industry, creating thoughtfully designed products for modern families. Our portfolio spans style-forward, safety-first furniture that meets rigorous quality standards.



You'll be joining a collaborative, fast-moving team where great design meets real impact—and where the work you create reaches millions of families at some of life's most meaningful moments.



About the Role



We're looking for a Paid Social Designer who can turn ideas, insights, and briefs into scroll-stopping ad creatives. You'll work closely with marketers and strategists to design high-performing visuals for paid social and digital campaigns while maintaining strong brand consistency.



This role sits at the intersection of creative + performance—you'll design not just what looks good, but what converts.





What You'll Do



Design static, carousel, and motion ad creatives for platforms such as Paid Social (Meta, Pinterest, TikTok, AppLovin, Youtube Ads),
/SMS

Translate creative briefs, hooks, and messaging into visually compelling content

Create multiple variations of concepts for structured A/B testing

Adapt creative to platform best practices safe zones, pacing, aspect ratios, sound/music

Partner with the growth marketing team to iterate on creatives based on performance (CTR, thumb-stop rate, conversions, etc.)

Collaborate cross functionally to share insights on customers through ad performance

Maintain brand guidelines while exploring new visual angles and formats

Prepare, organize, and deliver final assets for launch and handoff

Stay up to date with ad trends, platform best practices, and creative styles that perform



What We're Looking For



2+ years of experience (agency or in-house) designing static content for paid social and paid
 campaigns

Strong proficiency in design and video editing tools such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CapCut, or similar

Solid understanding of layout, typography, color, and visual hierarchy and ability to design content with ad performance in mind,, not just aesthetics

Comfortable working in a fast-paced, test-and-learn environment

Strong attention to detail and consistency across assets



Nice to Have



Experience designing ads for e-commerce or DTC brands

Familiarity with UGC-style creatives, motion graphics, or short-form video

Basic understanding of paid media KPIs (CTR, CPA, ROAS, thumbstop)

Experience collaborating with media buyers, growth, or performance teams

Exposure to AI-assisted or generative design tools for faster creative iteration



Please send your application on the link below:

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Attention, Rockstars! We’re looking for a full-time Executive Assistant. This role provides high-level administrative support to the CEO, ensuring the smooth operation of daily activities. This role involves managing schedules, coordinating meetings, handling communications, and performing a wide range of administrative tasks to support executives in their strategic responsibilities. The Executive Assistant acts as a key point of contact and is responsible for maintaining confidentiality, ensuring efficient workflow, and managing critical tasks with professionalism and discretion.



Responsibilities:

Manage the executive’s calendar, scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements, and ensuring that time is allocated efficiently.

Act as the primary point of contact for internal and external communications, screening calls,
s, and visitors, and directing inquiries as appropriate.

Coordinate meetings, conferences, and events, including preparing agendas, arranging logistics, and ensuring all materials are available.

Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, presentations, and other documents on behalf of the executive.

Handle confidential information with the utmost discretion and ensure sensitive documents are securely maintained.

Assist with special projects, conducting research, gathering data, and preparing reports as required by the executive.

Liaise with other departments and executives to ensure smooth communication and collaboration on cross-functional initiatives.

Anticipate the executive's needs and provide support to ensure they are well-prepared for meetings, presentations, and other engagements.



Qualifications/Requirements:

Proven experience (1-2 years) as an Executive Assistant, Personal Assistant, or in a similar role supporting senior executives.

Exceptional organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple responsibilities, and meet deadlines.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and polished demeanor.

Strong attention to detail and accuracy in completing tasks.

High level of discretion and confidentiality when handling sensitive information.

Proficiency in GSuite (Doc, Sheet, Slides, Drive) and Zoom Workspace and familiarity with office management tools and software.

Ability to work independently and proactively, with a strong sense of initiative.

Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with executives, staff, and external contacts.



Our Purpose:

To develop and market products that help individuals to grow in multiple facets in life.

To Increase awareness and skill sets for the public we serve.

To make a significant difference in the quality of life of people not reaching their potential and those often left behind.

To produce and develop Millionaire closers.



By applying, you will show that you are committed to being a SUCCESS, and your success is important to us. I believe in supporting our clients and helping associates achieve their financial goals.



The position is Full-Time (remote) between the hours of 8:00AM - 5:00PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday through Friday.

.





A CULTURE LIKE NO OTHER!

Limelight Media LLC is an equal opportunity employer. title: SEO Manager
description:
A growing and successful marketing agency is looking to add an SEO leader to our amazing staff! We are looking for a brilliant, organized individual who has the aptitude to perform logic-based and detail-oriented tasks at a reasonable pace, understands the value of hard work, and wants to grow with the company.  Please watch this video before applying: 



Role Purpose

The SEO Manager is responsible for developing strategy, executing and overseeing on page, off page and technical SEO, website project coordination, and performance monitoring across a multi-client portfolio. This role is a critical operational seat within the agency and requires ownership, accuracy, and the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously. This role operates under the strategic direction of the Director of Operations and is responsible for executing within established SEO frameworks, processes, and performance standards. Strategic oversight and final authority remain with the Director of Operations.



Why This Role Matters

Search performance directly impacts client retention, agency reputation, and growth.



This position exists to:

Protect the technical integrity of client websites

Ensure SEO deliverables are executed properly

Maintain workflow and deadlines

Identify opportunities for ranking and traffic growth

Support scalable operations as the agency grows

Importance in this role is earned through consistency, results, and independent ownership.



Core Responsibilities

SEO Planning Execution & Auditing

Run and interpret audits (Ahrefs, Search Atlas, Screaming Frog, LinkBoss)

Pull and analyze data from GSC

Perform citation audits

Evaluate service & geo targeting accuracy

Identify missing content opportunities

Support content silo strategy

Oversee indexing, sitemap integrity, and crawl health

Manage GA4, GTM, and conversion tracking setup

Monitor for penalties, crashes, or indexing issues

Assisting with link building

Expectation:  You are responsible for understanding what the data means and what action should follow.



Website & Content Publishing Project Management

Coordinate new website builds from SEO perspective

Verify technical work completion

Ensure plugins, backups, and security are maintained

Conduct QA before publishing

Support disaster recovery when needed

Expectation:  Nothing goes live without review and confirmation.



Workflow Management

Prioritize SEO tasks across multiple clients

Review staff task completion

Enforce deadlines

QA all deliverables

Monitor SEO-related client communications

Upload client assets when needed

Expectation: You will manage multiple campaigns simultaneously and maintain organization without constant oversight.



Content & Optimization Oversight

Oversee keyword-driven content creation (AI-assisted)

Ensure content aligns with service and geo strategy

Review before publishing

Expectation:  Content must be strategic, not filler.



Performance Standards

This role requires:

Comfortably managing multiple client accounts at once

Ability to learn quickly and apply feedback

Professional communication

Strong attention to detail

Willingness to operate within established processes

Accountability for mistakes and corrections



Growth Path

As proficiency, independence, and results improve, expanded responsibility may include:

Greater strategic input

Increased client-facing involvement

Broader operational exposure

Expanded responsibility, including increased client-facing exposure or operational involvement, is earned through consistent performance, independent decision-making, and demonstrated strategic comprehension.



This role must:

Deliver measurable impact

Operate efficiently

Align with leadership structure

Support scalable growth

If the role does not align with skill set or performance expectations, we will reassess fit.



Cross-Functional & Operational Support

In addition to core SEO responsibilities, this role provides limited cross-functional support to ensure operational continuity across the agency.



Responsibilities will also likely include:

Assisting with Canva-based creative assets for Google Business Profile posts and light social media initiatives

Supporting setup and scheduling within the approved posting software

Serving as backup support for SEM vendor monitoring and reporting oversight when needed

Other projects as assigned

Expectation: These responsibilities are supportive in nature and secondary to core SEO performance ownership.



To apply for the position, please include the word “unicorn” in the title of your application. Additionally, include a screenshot of your IQ test results from the Culture Fair IQ Test by Psychology Today (simply search for”Culture Fair IQ Test Psychology Today” and click the first link to take the test; it’s free).



Please be aware that there will be a trial interview following the initial interview process.

title: Product Analytics Manager (Amplitude)
description:
We’re a growing digital business looking for an experienced Amplitude analytics specialist to take day-to-day ownership of our product analytics. We already have a structured tracking setup and dedicated CRO team. Your role will be to maintain, improve, and monitor our Amplitude implementation - ensuring experiments are set up correctly, data is accurate, and performance issues are identified early. This is a long-term, stable remote role with real ownership.



What You’ll Do

- Own and manage our Amplitude workspace

- Maintain and enforce tracking plans

- Set up and validate A/B tests designed by our CRO team

- Ensure experiments are tracking correctly before and after launch

- Build and maintain dashboards used across the business

- Monitor traffic and conversion performance across global markets

- Analyse performance by country, device, browser and user type

- Spot anomalies, tracking issues or revenue-impacting problems

- Work closely with product and developers to maintain clean event data



What We’re Looking For

- Minimum 1 year hands-on experience using Amplitude

- Experience setting up Amplitude for websites or products

- Experience creating dashboards and reports

- Experience supporting or implementing A/B tests

- Strong attention to detail

- Comfortable working independently

- Fluent English (written and spoken)

- Available to work full UK business hours



About Us

- Fully remote team

- Small, fast-moving digital business

- Multiple global websites and products



What We Offer

- Competitive salary including 13th month pay

- Paid holiday including all local holidays

- Stable long-term job

- Opportunity to grow with the company



How to Apply

Alongside your CV, please include:

- A brief example of an Amplitude project you’ve worked on

- A dashboard you’ve created (screenshots welcome)

-Comfortable making 1,000+ dials per day

title: Social Media & Brand Growth Strategist
description:
The Mission

We are looking for a self-sufficient Social Media Strategist who doesn't need to be "babysat." You aren't just here to post pictures; you are here to grow Babiesmart and our private labels (Toddly, Movana, Glowly) by driving organic traffic, building community, and creating content that converts.



If you are a strategist who understands how to turn a TikTok trend or a Reddit thread into a sale, we want to hear from you.



Key Responsibilities

Platform Mastery: Independently manage and grow our presence on TikTok, Instagram,
, Pinterest, and Reddit.



Reddit & Community Engagement: Actively participate in parenting subreddits and FB groups. You must know how to provide value and subtly seed our products (Toddly, Movana) without sounding like a spammer.



Short-Form Video Production: Take our product footage and use AI tools (Sora, Veo, CapCut) to create high-energy, engaging Reels and TikToks that stop the scroll.



Influencer Outreach: Find and negotiate with micro-influencers who align with our "Brand House" aesthetic.



Growth Reporting: Don't just show us "likes." Show us how your organic efforts are driving traffic to our website to help us lower our Google Ads spend.



The "Expert" Requirements

Independence: You come to us with ideas and a plan. You don't wait for us to tell you what to post.



Creative Flair: You have a "eye" for what parents find trustworthy and aesthetically pleasing.



AI Knowledge: You are comfortable using AI video and graphic tools to speed up production and improve quality.



Writing Skills: You can write "parent-to-parent" in perfect, conversational English.



How to Apply

Do not just send a generic resume. To be considered, you must include:



A link to your portfolio showing social media growth or high-quality video content you've produced.



The "Toddly Test": Go to our website and pick ONE product. Tell us in 3 sentences how you would make that product go viral on TikTok or Reddit this week.



Why Babiesmart?

We are a fast-growing Australian "Brand House" targeting $2M in sales in 2026. You will be a key part of our growth engine, working directly with our Operations Lead and Founder. As we grow, your role and hours can grow with us.

title: Direct Response Video Editor
description:
We’re an employee-owned, vertically-integrated company operating in the pet space. 



With 30+ tea
mbers across Europe and worldwide, we specialize in direct-response marketing, creating high-converting ads and VSLs that generate 7+ figures annually.



We prioritize quality, responsiveness, and velocity—delivering creative that doesn’t just look good but drives conversions. 



If you’re a top 1% video editor who thrives in performance-driven environments, keep reading.



We’re Looking For: A High-Performance Direct Response Video Editor



We need an extra-talented video editor who understands both direct response marketing and high-impact storytelling. 



You will be responsible for editing short and long-form video content, crafting compelling motion graphics, and structuring edits that maximize engagement, retention, and conversion rates.



This is a remote role, but you’ll be part of a global team collaborating on high-budget campaigns for
, YouTube, and VSLs. If you know how to turn raw footage into money-making assets, we want you.



What You’ll Be Doing:



- Edit and assemble raw footage into scroll-stopping, high-converting ads and VSLs.

- Develop and integrate motion graphics that enhance persuasion and storytelling.

- Optimize hook, pacing, and retention to maximize performance.

- Work with marketers, copywriters, and media buyers to test and refine creatives.

- Stay updated on what’s working in paid ads and apply performance data to your edits.

- Manage multiple projects under tight deadlines while maintaining high-quality execution.



What You Bring to the Table:



- A strong aesthetic eye. We care about taste — technique can be taught.



- A portfolio that shows polished, detail-oriented work.



- Experience editing for e-commerce brands or YouTube channels.



- Deep understanding of platform-specific ad formats (FB, IG, YouTube).



- Knows how to hook an audience within 3 seconds and maintain engagement.



- Works fast, meets deadlines, and thrives in a high-performance team.



- Bonus #1: Experience in the pet niche.



- Bonus #2: Experience with AI video generation and voice tools such as Sora, Veo, HeyGen, Higgsfield, Dreamface, ElevenLabs, or similar. 



Why Join Us?



- Work on high-budget ad campaigns that generate real results.

- Remote-first—work from anywhere, collaborate with top-tier talent worldwide.

- Be part of a 7-figure company where great work is valued and rewarded.

- Join an elite team of A-Players who push for excellence in every project.



How to Apply:



DON’T REPLY to this job post, but click the link below and fill the form. Those who do not follow this first simple instruction will be immediately excluded.



Apply now here:

title: Marketing Strategist
description:
About Us



KHE Academy Hair Weaving School is a licensed, hands-on training academy dedicated to developing the next generation of professional hair weaving specialists. We offer flexible, hybrid programs designed for aspiring beauty professionals ready to build real careers in the industry.



We are growing and looking for a results-driven marketing strategist who understands how to attract, engage, and convert students into enrollment.



?



Position Overview



We are seeking a strategic marketing professional or agency to develop and execute campaigns that drive qualified student enrollment.



This is not a content-only role — we are looking for someone who can generate leads, increase conversions, and scale enrollment.



?



Key Responsibilities



• Develop and execute a student acquisition strategy

• Generate qualified leads through digital and local marketing efforts

• Manage and optimize paid advertising campaigns (Meta, Google, TikTok)

• Create and oversee content strategy aligned with our brand (beauty + education)

• Build partnerships with beauty supply stores, influencers, and local businesses

• Improve conversion funnels (landing pages, DMs, booking links, etc.)

• Track and report performance metrics weekly



?



Required Qualifications



• Proven experience in lead generation and conversion marketing

• Experience in beauty, education, or service-based industries preferred

• Strong understanding of social media marketing (Instagram, TikTok)

• Experience running paid ads with measurable ROI

• Ability to create and execute data-driven strategies

• Strong communication and reporting skills



?



Proposal Requirement (MANDATORY)



To be considered, all applicants must submit a custom marketing proposal outlining:



• Target audience strategy

• Lead generation plan

• Platform strategy (social media, ads, partnerships, etc.)

•
day execution plan

• KPI tracking (leads, cost per enrollment, conversions)

• Budget recommendations + expected ROI

• Relevant case studies or past results



Applications without a proposal will not be considered.



Compensation



• Contract-based (hourly retainer and/or performance-based)

• Performance incentives available based on enrollment growth

title: Technical Operations Builder
description:
(Automation & Systems Integrator)



We are looking for a highly technical, execution-focused operator who loves building systems.



This is not a traditional virtual assistant role. This is a hands-on technical execution position for someone who enjoys learning new tools, wiring systems together, troubleshooting issues, and making ideas actually work.



You will work directly with the founder to implement and maintain operational systems across the company. The founder engineers the plans. You build, connect, test, document, and improve it.



If you wait for step-by-step instructions, this role is not for you.

If you enjoy figuring things out and making systems run smoothly, you’ll thrive here.



What You’ll Do



Build and maintain automations using tools like Zapier

Create and manage Mailchimp automations and workflows

Configure WordPress plugins and forms

Connect tools together (forms ? CRM ? task boards ?
/text systems)

Troubleshoot when systems break and fix issues quickly

Document systems clearly so others can run them

Learn new tools rapidly and implement them with minimal guidance

Take ownership of technical execution on projects



When a project is launched, you will have your steps and responsibilities alongside the founder. If something needs to be built, tested, or made functional, you are the one who makes it happen.



Required Skills & Experience



Strong comfort with learning and navigating new software independently

Experience with automation tools (Zapier or similar)

Experience with Mailchimp (especially automations)

Experience working inside WordPress

Strong understanding of Google Workspace

Experience building or maintaining operational systems

Ability to troubleshoot logically and escalate with clear documentation



You Might Be a Good Fit If



You enjoy clicking through tools until you understand them

You’ve taught yourself software without formal training

You think in workflows and systems

You get satisfaction from fixing broken processes

You are calm when something breaks and methodical in solving it

You prefer building over attending meetings



You Are Not a Good Fit If



You need detailed step-by-step instructions to get started

You prefer purely administrative work

You avoid technical problems

You get overwhelmed by new software environments

You wait for direction instead of taking initiative



Tools You Will Likely Use



Zapier

Mailchimp

WordPress & WPForms

Trello

Google Workspace

Text messaging automation systems

Additional tools as we grow



Availability



Must be available during Central Time working hours and responsive during core hours.



Compensation



$303/week USD (full-time)



This role is ideal for someone who wants to grow into a long-term technical operations leader inside a company.



Application Instructions



Please include:



Your resume

A short 2–3 minute voice or video recording explaining:



A system or automation you built and How you approach troubleshooting when something breaks



A written answer to this question:



“Explain how you would build a workflow where a form submission triggers a Trello card, sends an
 confirmation, and adds the contact to a Mailchimp automation.”



Applications without all three will not be considered.

title: WordPress / WooCommerce Developer (Bricks Builder Expert)
description:
About Us-

We are a fast-growing eCommerce company looking for a highly skilled, detail-oriented WordPress developer who can step in immediately and take ownership of our website. We offer a very large inventory with over 20,000 products. This requires very strategic page layouts and product filtering. We need a candidate that can jump in and handle our current issues with speed and extreme efficiency. We are working on a very tight timeline.



This position will be a tiered pay upon task completion. Phase 1 (pay out) - Phase 2 (pay out)



Our site is built on WordPress with WooCommerce and Bricks Builder. We need someone experienced, confident, and capable of solving complex issues quickly. This is not an entry-level role.

We are looking for a strong, all-around web professional who can handle both technical development and strategic marketing implementation.



Responsibilities-

Build new pages using Bricks Builder

Resolve WooCommerce product filtering issues

Fix website bugs and technical errors

Optimize site speed and overall performance

Perform ongoing website maintenance

Set up and optimize
 marketing systems

Implement eCommerce marketing and sales strategies

Improve conversion rates

Manage and troubleshoot AWS hosting

Handle general website troubleshooting and optimization



Required Skills & Experience-

Strong expertise in WordPress

Advanced experience with WooCommerce

Advanced experience with Bricks Builder

Strong understanding of website speed optimization (Core Web Vitals, caching, etc.)

Experience with
 marketing integrations

Solid understanding of eCommerce UX and conversion strategies

AWS hosting knowledge (server setup, troubleshooting, performance optimization)

Ability to debug and solve issues independently

Strong communication skills

Ability to work quickly under tight deadlines

Highly detail-oriented and organized



What We’re Looking For-

A problem-solver who takes initiative

Someone who works efficiently and moves fast

A developer who understands marketing and sales strategy

Comfortable in a fast-paced environment



Trial Period-

There will be a short trial period.

Candidates will be asked to complete one of our current website issues as a paid test project to determine if it’s a good fit for both sides.



How to Apply-

Please include:

Links to previous WordPress/WooCommerce projects (especially Bricks Builder sites)

A brief description of similar issues you’ve solved

Your availability and typical turnaround times

Your hourly or project rate

We are ready to move quickly for the right candidate.

If you are confident in your WordPress, WooCommerce, and Bricks Builder expertise and thrive under pressure, we want to hear from you.

title: Android Developer
description:
We’re looking for a Native Android Developer to build and maintain high-quality Android applications. You’ll work closely with product, design, and backend teams to ship features, improve performance, and deliver a great mobile experience.



What You’ll Do

 • Build and maintain native Android apps using Kotlin (and/or Java where applicable)

 • Collaborate with designers and product managers to translate requirements into clean, scalable features

 • Integrate APIs and manage data using modern Android architecture patterns

 • Write unit tests and instrumentation tests to keep quality high

 • Debug issues, improve performance, and optimize app reliability

 • Participate in code reviews and contribute to engineering best practices

 • Maintain CI/CD pipelines for Android builds (as applicable)

 • Ensure apps follow Play Store policies and Android platform guidelines



Requirements

 • 2+ years of experience developing native Android apps

 • Strong proficiency in Kotlin and Android SDK

 • Experience with Jetpack (e.g., ViewModel, LiveData/Flow, Room, Navigation)

 • Familiarity with MVVM or similar architecture

 • Experience consuming RESTful APIs (Retrofit/OkHttp or similar)

 • Understanding of threading/concurrency (Coroutines, Flow)

 • Solid debugging skills and comfort using Android Studio tooling

 • Git proficiency and experience with collaborative development workflows

This is NOT a basic editing job.

If you only know how to cut a timeline in Premiere, this role is not for you.



What You’ll Be Doing



Editing 10–20 minute YouTube videos



Building custom motion graphics from scratch in After Effects



Matching existing visual branding and animation style



Creating dynamic visual 
nts to emphasize key psychological concepts

REQUIRED Skills

title: Online Math/Science Teacher(Near-Native Accent)
description:
About Pomelo Academy

Pomelo Academy is an innovative online international school dedicated to delivering high-quality education to students worldwide. We provide a dynamic and engaging learning environment, catering to individualized instruction that transcends geographical boundaries.



Job Description

We are seeking passionate and experienced Near-Native English-speaking Online K-12 Math and/or Science Teachers with verifiable teaching certifications. The ideal candidates will have strong academic backgrounds in Mathematics and/or Science, experience teaching young learners (ages 5–18), and a commitment to creating a supportive, inquiry-based, and engaging online learning environment.



Responsibilities



Deliver interactive and engaging Math and/or Science lessons to individuals and small groups of 2–6 students aged 5–18.

Teach using internationally recognized curricula such as A Closer Look, Glencoe Science, Pearson Interactive Science, NGSS-aligned resources, Singapore Math, or IB/AP/A Level Math programs.

Create age-appropriate lesson plans focused on conceptual understanding, inquiry, problem-solving, and real-world applications.

Incorporate visuals, multimedia, and hands-on virtual activities to make abstract concepts accessible and engaging.

Monitor student progress and provide timely feedback to students and parents.

Foster curiosity, discussion, and active learning in a safe and supportive space.



Qualifications



Professional teacher with at least 2 years of teaching experience (Kindergarten–Grade 12).

Must hold a valid teaching license/certification (e.g., Teaching License, State Certification). TESOL/TEFL is a plus.

Near-native English accent with excellent spoken and written communication skills.

Strong academic background in Mathematics and/or Science (Biology, Physics, Chemistry, General Science).

Experience teaching in public/international schools or reputable online platforms.

Familiarity with inquiry-based and/or interdisciplinary approaches (e.g., STEM/STEAM).

Comfortable working between 07:00–22:00 (Weekdays) and 9:00–22:00 (Weekends), GMT+8.

Proficiency with digital platforms such as ClassIn, Microsoft Office, and other educational technologies.

Must have a stable and fast internet connection and a PC/laptop with at least Windows 10 or Mac OS Catalina.



Benefits



Flexible working hours.

Opportunity to teach using globally respected Math and Science curricula.

Be part of an international, passionate team of educators.

Access to training and professional development.

Regular enrollment model (not a booking system), ensuring schedule stability and consistency

title: Corporate Leasing Executive
description:
This job position is BASED IN SINGAPORE




.sg



Start Something Purposeful.



At Acuvest Group, we believe in creating concepts that allow people, business and purpose to come together and thrive. We’re a privately owned real estate group dedicated to real estate concepts for industrial and commercial spaces. We are both owners of industrial properties, commercial shophouses and spaces, as well as operators of business models and concepts such as urbanspace self storage, Urbanpod workspace etc. 



We actively invest to expand our asset portfolio and grow our industrial and shophouse asset management capabilities and offerings.  



We’re looking for a Business Development and Sales Executive to bring our asset investment and management services to our clients, partners and stakeholders. 



Your Mission 



To be part of the team to grow our asset portfolio and drive performance through innovations and teamwork. 



This is a full-stack business development and sales role with plenty of room to use your skillsets in sales, strategy, innovation and execution. You’ll work with a motivated team and collaborate closely with other departments. You will report to the Business Development / Sales Director and play a critical role in the company’s performance.

Full job description : What you will be doing



Property Leasing :



- Develop and implement leasing strategies and initiatives to maximize occupancy, rental income, and tenant satisfaction



- Identify leasing opportunities and prospective tenants that align with the positioning and target market of each property, and develop relationships with tenants and prospective tenants.



- Negotiate lease agreements, including terms and conditions, rental rates, lease incentives, and lease renewals, and ensure compliance with company policies and industry standards.



- Collaborate with property management teams to conduct market research and analysis, assess competitive landscape, and identify trends and opportunities in the property market.



- Develop and maintain leasing budgets, forecasts, and reports, and track leasing activity, occupancy rates, and financial performance against targets and benchmarks.



- Manage tenant relations and communication, including addressing tenant inquiries, resolving disputes, and ensuring tenant compliance with lease terms and property rules and regulations.



- Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking opportunities to promote our properties and attract potential tenants and partners.



Self storage sales :



- Work closely self storage sales team and management on drive the sales and occupancy of our self storage business.



Property Investment :



- Work closely with Management team to develop business opportunities for new property investment and development projects on a project basis.



- Unlock Potential: Identify underutilized properties and devise creative strategies to maximize their value and utility
